Text: Re TicketsThanks a lot Reply Separator Subject RE Re Tickets Author at DCLAEInternet Date PM i sent it today so you should get it by thurs Original Message From Larry CentolaENRON Sent Tuesday October PM To Lenhart Matthew Subject Re Tickets Please send the tickets to The Honorable G Thomas Porteous Jr United States District Judge United States District Court Eastern District of Louisiana Camp Street Room C New Orleans LA attn Larry Centola Thanks a bunch Reply Separator Subject RE Tickets Author at DCLAEInternet Date AM i got them i left you a voice mail last night send me your address and i will mail them today Original Message From Larry CentolaENRON Sent Monday October PM To Lenhart Matthew Subject Tickets Did you get the tickets from Tim Send me an email or call me at Larry This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and maycontain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly p rohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for t he recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at enronmessag and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance a nd do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Co rp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party an d may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or other wise Thank you
